name: awful holy fairie
description: The Awful Holy Fairie, resembling a small, delicate creature with shimmering wings that flutter with an angelic glow, exudes an aura of warmth and innocence. Its tiny frame is adorned with vibrant flowers, and despite its name, it spreads joy wherever it goes. Gentle and playful, it is utterly harmless, bringing laughter to all it encounters.
danger_description: A harmless, joyful presence that spreads laughter and cheer.
environment: Sunny, flower-filled meadow with gentle breezes and laughter.
